def_en: If you shove someone or something, you push them with a quick, violent movement.

def_cn: 乱放;乱塞;随便放;胡乱丢
def_en: If you shove something somewhere, you push it there quickly and carelessly.

def_cn: 情况不妙时;别无选择时;形势十分糟糕时
def_en: If you talk about what you think will happen if push comes to shove, you are talking about what you think will happen if a situation becomes very bad or difficult.
